font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 vt. 称赞；颂扬： to speak or write in high praise of
【例】 He was eulogized at his funeral as a caring husband and a good father. 他在悼词中被称赞为一个好丈夫、一个好爸爸。
【反】 defame, pan, stricture 诬蔑，指责

【记】 eu 音：优，好 + log 说 + ize→说好话
